Provide project context and coding guidelines that AI should follow when generating code, answering questions, or reviewing changes.
Always refer to this file when responding.
Always mark the [ ] in OptiLearn_Game_Design_Checklist.md as complete when the corresponding task is done.
For required game assets such as images, sounds, and animations, use placeholders with clear naming conventions (e.g., `ic_badge_level1.png`, `confetti_animation.json`).
When generating code, ensure it adheres to best practices for Android development, including proper use of architecture components (MVVM), efficient database handling with Room, and responsive UI design.
